mapper.select: SELECT CI.CARTID, CI.ITEMID, CI.CATEGORYID, CI.QUANTITY, I.ITEMID AS "item.itemId", I.UNITCOST AS "item.unitCost", I.SUPPLIER AS "item.supplierId", I.PRODUCTID AS "item.productId", I.STATUS AS "item.status", I.ATTR1 AS "item.attribute1", I.ATTR2 AS "item.attribute2", I.ATTR3 AS "item.attribute3", I.ATTR4 AS"item. attribute4", I.ATTR5 AS "item.attribute5" FROM CARTITEM CI, ITEM I WHERE CI.CARTID = #{cartId} AND CI.ITEMID = I.ITEMID

SELECT CI.CARTID, CI.ITEMID, CI.CATEGORYID, CI.QUANTITY, I.ITEMID AS "item.itemId", I.UNITCOST AS "item.unitCost", I.SUPPLIER AS "item.supplierId", I.PRODUCTID AS "item.productId", I.STATUS AS "item.status", I.ATTR1 AS "item.attribute1", I.ATTR2 AS "item.attribute2", I.ATTR3 AS "item.attribute3", I.ATTR4 AS"item. attribute4", I.ATTR5 AS "item.attribute5" FROM CARTITEM CI, ITEM I WHERE CI.CARTID = #{cartId} AND CI.ITEMID = I.ITEMID AND CI.ITEMID = #{itemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTITEM (CARTID, ITEMID,CATEGORYID, QUANTITY) SELECT #{cartId}, I.ITEMID, P.CATEGORY AS CATEGORYID, #{quantity} FROM PRODUCT P,ITEM I WHERE P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID AND I.ITEMID = #{itemId}
